subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,   
Is this your private email address?
Should you be interested in working with me on a financial related project? Please reply back via
Thanks and have a nice day,
Mr. Heang Sopheak
Director
Shinhan Khmer Bank

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Heang Sopheak,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always open to new opportunities and would love to hear more about this financial related project you mentioned. Could you please provide some more details about it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Have a great day!

Best wishes,
Greg

subject: Re: MORE INFO!
body:
Hello friend,

Thanks for the quick response.

Your mail is well understood and I will appreciate it if you will work with
me in this transaction with a good understanding and sincere heart.

During the reporting process, I discovered in 2016 that my branch made
($21,537,000.00) this money which the head office is not aware of.  This
amount is currently placed in what we call SUSPENSE ACCOUNT without any
beneficiary. As an officer of the Shinhan Khmer Bank in Phnom Penh,
Cambodia, I cannot be directly connected to this money, so this is why I
have to contact you for us to work so that you can assist receive this
money. I need you to stand as the original depositor of the money to enable
my Head office grant approval for the release of this fund.

The said amount is acrued interest undocumented within the bank which has
been placed in a suspense account. This amount will be registered under
your name as the beneficiary if you agree to work with me in this
transaction. This is a legal transaction in which we shall follow due
process whilst claiming the fund with no retribution to all the parties
involved whatsoever.

As a banker, I understand transferring such a huge amount directly from
bank to bank will lead to paying huge fees as a result of international
banking regulation before receiving the funds over there in your country.
Hence, for us to avoid this as impediment, I will bring this idea of the
fund being released via an ATM card which will be sent to your address. The
process bears no hindrance from the authority as it will be a very direct
release process with no impediment.

Immediately you receive the ATM card, you will start making withdrawals
from it before my arrival to meet with you. I would like us to reach an
agreement before we proceed further.

kindly send to me your full information such as:
your full name
your address
telephone number
copy of any identification of you

As soon as I receive the above information from you, I will then draft an
MOU agreement which will contain each persons share for both of us to sign
before we complete the fund release process through an ATM card.

I can assure you that whatever questions you would need to ask or any other
thing you will need to know regarding this transaction will be adequately
answered to give you a clearer understanding of it all, so as to arrive at
a successful conclusion.

At the end of this transaction, we shall divide the amount in a 50-50 share
ratio of which I plan to invest a good part of my share in your country
under your supervision. All I require from you is your maximum cooperation.

I look forward to hearing from you. Do call or send me a message on my
whatsApp for further clarification: +855967405973

Thanks and have a nice day,
Heang Sopheak

subject: Re: MORE INFO!
body:
Hello Heang Sopheak,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. However, I have a few questions that I'd like to clarify before we proceed further.

Firstly, could you please explain more about this 'suspense account'? How does it work and why is the money placed there? 

Secondly, you mentioned that the fund will be registered under my name. What are the implications of this? Will there be any legal responsibilities on my part?

Thirdly, regarding the ATM card process, how secure is it? And how would I go about making withdrawals from it?

Lastly, could you provide more details about the MOU agreement? What exactly will it entail?

I'm sorry for all these questions but as someone who isn't very familiar with banking procedures, I just want to make sure I understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Greg

subject: Re: MORE INFO!
body:
Hello Heang Sopheak,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with banking procedures and such, but your explanation makes it sound like a unique opportunity.

I do have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned that the money is currently in a suspense account. Could you explain what that means? Also, how does an ATM card work in this situation? I've only ever used mine to withdraw money from my own account.

As for the MOU agreement, could you give me a brief overview of what it would entail? I'd like to understand more about it before we proceed further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Greg

subject: Re: MORE INFO!
body:
Hello friend,

How are you doing today?

The complication in releasing huge sums via bank to bank is enormous and
that is why I prefer the ATM card release which is discrete and less
problematic. The ATM card comes with a special higher than normal
withdrawal limit which allows you to withdraw big amounts. This ATM card
will be linked to a special online account which upon activation will grant
you access for online transfer usage which also solves our problem of huge
money transfers.
kindly send to me your full information such as:

your full name
your address
telephone number
copy of any identification of you

The said funds do not come under the control of the government at the
moment within which your bank operates. We can rightly lay claim to the
fund as it is eligible for redistribution. I assure you the bank will not
ask you any questions or documents because I have all the documents
relating to this transaction. I have all the documents relating to this
fund deposited with the bank. I am a PEACE-loving, HONEST and simple man.

I assure that if we join hands together trusting each other's judgement,
this transaction will be successful.

Thanks and have a nice day,
Heang Sopheak

subject: Re: MORE INFO!
body:
Hello Heang Sopheak,

I hope you're having a wonderful day! Your message is quite intriguing, I must say. The concept of an ATM card with higher withdrawal limits sounds very interesting. 

Could you please explain more about how this ATM card works? And what do you mean by a special online account? How does it function?

Also, could you clarify what you meant by the funds not coming under the control of the government? How is that possible?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Greg
